2074.subject: HPWE
2074.descrlong: Provides student-athletes with strategies and knowledge that will help them make the best possible choices in their collegiate experience. Topics include becoming a lifelong learner; goal setting and time management; self-awareness; critical and creative thinking; relating to others; managing your career and your money; moving beyond college. Exposes student-athletes to the concept that success comes from within and that knowledge is power. (Offered fall semester.)
